release dates: USA::3 August 2012                            (World Peace Film & Music Festival)

1.title: Aslan Youth Ministry
1.plot: Host Jim Fields "Pays It Forward" to Aslan Youth Ministry, which had a profound effect on his life. Aslan Youth Ministry is an organization founded in NJ which works to bring food and guidance to drug infested and poverty stricken neighborhoods.Since Jim was a kid Aslan's efforts have expanded beyond NJ to Haiti. Jim recognizes that he can now make a difference by helping Aslan in a profound way.

imdb.plot outline: Pay It Forward is an original Reality Television project. It is about the people and organizations that go unnoticed by most, but leave a strong and supportive impact on the people and communities that they effect. The first episode focuses on Aslan youth ministry which works to bring food and guidance to drug infested and poverty stricken neighborhoods.
imdb.title: Pay It Forward
plot: _Pay It Forward_ (qv) is an original Reality Television project.::FMC

_Pay It Forward_ (qv) is an original Reality Television project.
